precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By ▶' is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active. The options for themes will be replaced with options for screen savers.

precondition: The Display Properties window is open with the 'Screen Saver' tab active. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the downward-pointing arrow of the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will expand, showing a list of available screen savers. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu within the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "None" option in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close, the "Wait" time box will populate with "10", and the "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will remain inactive.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open with the 'Screen Saver' tab active.
action: Click the button labeled 'Power...' at the bottom of the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Home/Office Desk" option within the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting in the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should display "Always On".
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Presentation".
expected_results: The "Power schemes" value will change to "Presentation" and the "Turn off hard disks" value will change to "After 20 mins".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section is visible.
action: Click on the downward-pointing arrow of the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of monitor timeout options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close and the "Turn off hard disks" setting will be set to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: The changes made to the power options will be applied.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the desired power scheme and settings selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
